variants.title: Standout Hero
variants.note: Default treatment on project pages without images. Occupies up to 1/3rd of the vertical viewport size.
variants.name: _standout-header

variants.title: Colorblock Hero
variants.name: colorblock-header
variants.note: Allows use of `.bg-regal-purple`, `.bg-legacy-red`, and `.bg-deep-steel` helper classes.

variants.title: Image
variants.name: banner-image
variants.note: Occupies up to 80% of the vertical viewport size.

variants.title: Colorblock Hero
variants.name: colorblock-banner
variants.note: `.bg-deep-steel`, `.bg-legacy-red`, `.bg-regal-purple`. Supports `.bg-timeless-gold`, though it should be noted that this will [fail WCAG SC 1.4.3: Contrast (Minimum) at any size](https://www.siegemedia.com/contrast-ratio#%23ffffff-on-%23ddb331).
